snippet: The soul legend, who released his last album in 1985 but whose work has remained omnipresent, is warily returning to the spotlight for a year of tributes.
abstract: Soul legend Bill Withers, who has hidden from limelight for past three decades, is experiencing revival despite his unwillingness to step back into public eye; has been inducted into Rock and Roll Hall of Fame this year, and will be honored at tribute concert at Carnegie Hall in October.
lead_paragraph: The soul legend, who released his last album in 1985 but whose work has remained omnipresent, is warily returning to the spotlight for a year of tributes.

headline.main: Bill Withers: Still Himself, but He’ll Allow the Attention
headline.print_headline: Still Bill, but He’ll Allow the Attention

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
